name: The Wilhelm Contract
description:
Play as an exorcist as you explore a large but claustrophobic mansion while attempting to exorcise the variety of ghosts within. But there is a catch: You can only see them through mirrors and other reflective surfaces. Learn about the stories of how these ghosts died, how they came to haunt the mansion, and cast them out before they kill you.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

*Headphones are recommended*

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

by Last Take Studios

for a CAPSTONE project

won Best CAPSTONE 2 Award

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
